title: Boutique Provence 15th-Century Chateau Escape with Daily Breakfast & Onsite Winery Tours
description:
Discover why wine lovers flock to the South of France with a stay at this 15th-century chateau, nestled among the rolling vines of Provence. This charming chateau, steeped in history, offers a tranquil escape from the everyday. Savour the flavours of the region at La Table de Saint Roux restaurant, where locally sourced ingredients take centre stage in dishes such as truffle risotto and braised shoulder of lamb. For wine connoisseurs, the chateau's vineyard offers a tantalising selection of organic wines. The cellar door is the perfect spot to taste their selection, pairing your favourite drop with garden vegetables and goat's cheese from the onsite farm.

When you're ready to explore, meander down the cobblestoned streets of Le Cannet-des-Maures, where boutique stores sit beside authentic bakehouses. The glamour of Saint Tropez is less than an hour's drive away, or stick to the countryside to find a secluded stream for an afternoon picnic. Meet new furry friends at Saint Roux Farm, designed as an educational place for guests to enjoy the company of goats and donkeys.
offer_address: Route D√©partementale 17, Route de la Garde, Freinet 83340, Le Cannet des Maures, France

title: France Five-Star Boutique Provence Farmhouse with Three-Course Dinner & Daily Buffet Breakfast
description:
Discover French elegance with a stay at Le Domaine du Mas de Pierre in the heart of Provence. This classic farmhouse offers five-star luxury in a boutique Relais & Ch√¢teaux property, with sophisticated d√©cor, antique furnishing and a gentle colour palette that‚Äôs synonymous with Proven√ßal design. Even more enchanting than the hotel‚Äôs interior is the eight hectares of manicured garden. Breathe in scents of lavender and rose as you wander through the sculpture-dotted grounds, uncovering gems such as the orchid greenhouse, olive grove and manmade lagoon with the straw-hut La Paillotte du Lagon bar. The exceptional day spa offering various indulgent, holistic treatments is sure to rejuvenate and align mind, body and soul.

The nearby medieval village of Saint-Paul-de-Vence is a five-minute drive from Le Domaine du Mas de Pierre and is home to art galleries, historic monuments and cosy caf√©s. This beautiful hilltop village is perfect for an afternoon wander - just follow the cobbled pathways and lose yourself among the charming streets.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up each morning to a delicious daily buffet breakfast at La Table de Pierre
- Toast your escape with a welcome glass of local wine per adult
- Your escape is off to a great start with a welcome bottle of wine waiting in your room on arrival
- Unlimited spa access to use the sauna, hammam and more with 10% off all treatments
- Take your tastebuds on a journey through the region with one indulgent three-course dinner per person

**Book with 100% Confidence:** Right up until 14 days before check-in you can enjoy unlimited, free date changes, or cancel and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
location_description: Le Domaine du Mas de Pierre

title: Five-Star Provence Relais & Ch√¢teaux Luxury with Onsite Winery & Vineyards
description:
Step into a world where 18th-century charm and contemporary luxuries collide at the five-star Ch√¢teau de Fonscolombe, Provence. Part of the prestigious Relais & Ch√¢teaux collection, this immaculately restored retreat is set deep in the countryside, encircled by renowned vineyards. Framed by fairytale twin turrets, inspired by the region's prestigious history and with vineyards and a winery onsite, this 300-year-old Proven√ßal ch√¢teau invites you to enjoy an opulent retreat once reserved for nobility.

Inside, period chinoiserie designs and Italian leather tapestries line its beautiful walls, while canopied beds, sculpted fireplaces and soft colours reflect the chic, rustic Proven√ßal charm of the estate's past. Expect handpainted wallpaper, lavish chandeliers, reclaimed tiles and wrought-iron balconies, as well sweeping vistas across the main courtyard, dovecotes and grounds - dotted with historic statues, a chapel, fountains and a vegetable garden. Stepping outside, you will find an ancient stone pond turned into a swimming pool and an impressive arboretum. In summer, guests may opt to dine under the huge 300-year-old bald cypress, as the property's stylish L'Orangerie restaurant goes alfresco.
offer_address: Rte de Saint-Canadet, 13610 Le Puy-Sainte-R√©parade, France

title: French Chateau Grandeur in the Heart of Provence
description:
Embrace the finest in European elegance with a stay at Villa Baulieu, a historic five-star property nestled within vineyards in the stunning Provence countryside. Built in the era of Henry III in 1576, this breathtaking architectural gem has been luxuriously restored to present the epitome of luxury, with a Tuscan-inspired design and 22 hectares of pristine parklands and gardens.

Each of the 11 rooms and suites has been lovingly restored to reflect the opulence and sophistication of historical periods, with modern touches artfully integrated. Get lost among the gardens, vineyards, olive groves or almond trees, or explore the breathtaking beauty of the surrounding countryside via bicycle. If you fancy staying closer to home, snuggle up with a good book in the cosy library and reading room, or soak up the rays poolside. Pop into nearby towns for a classic French lunch, or chat to the villa‚Äôs team about organising a meal. With 48 hours‚Äô notice, butlers will serve a delicate multi-course experience in the dining room, orangery or lower courtyard, prepared using ingredients grown onsite. 

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Start each morning with an indulgent **daily breakfast** you‚Äôll be dreaming about all day long
- Soak up every second of your escape with an **early 12pm check-in and late 3pm checkout**
- Sample the region‚Äôs delicacies with a **bottle of local wine and bag of locally grown almonds** per room on arrival
- Delight in **one delectable afternoon tea per person per stay**, complete with traditional Proven√ßal favourites
- Enjoy a longer stay for a **guaranteed upgrade to the next available room category** (3+ nights)
offer_address: Domaine de Beaulieu - CD14C, Route de Beaulieu, 13840 Rognes, France

title: Boutique Countryside Retreat in French Provence with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Spa
description:
Experience the epitome of French elegance at this lavish boutique retreat located in the heart of the Provence region. This countryside paradise is a haven of tranquillity, surrounded by olive groves, cherry trees and lavender fields, offering an authentic taste of the charming French countryside.

Unwind at the serene onsite spa, take a dip in one of the sparkling outdoor pools or disconnect with a yoga class among the hotel's aromatic gardens. Savour the flavours of Provence at the Michelin-starred La Bastide restaurant, where dishes are crafted from locally sourced ingredients, or explore the picturesque villages of nearby Bonnieux and Lacoste.
offer_address: Les Claparedes, 550 Chemin des Cabanes, 84480 Bonnieux, France

title: Boutique Vineyard Retreat in Provence by Relais & Ch√¢teaux with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Discover a new level of elegance at this luxurious wine country escape, set within a grand 18th-century French chateau. Spanning 515 hectares of lush nature, look no further than this charming base for discovering the many treasures of sun-kissed Provence. Unwind at the serene onsite spa, take a dip in one of the sparkling outdoor pools or disconnect with a yoga class among vineyards.

For a true taste of the region, indulge at the Michelin-starred Le Jardin de Berne, or enjoy a more relaxed meal at the adjoining Bistrot. For wine enthusiasts, Ch√¢teau de Berne offers the opportunity to indulge in its award-winning drops through guided tastings and cellar tours. With 150 hectares of vineyards producing red, ros√© and white C√¥tes de Provence, you'll be spoilt for choice.
offer_address: Chemin des Imberts, Flayosc 83780, Provence, France
